    Fields in game_code with type parameters of type Good
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.util.Hashtable<Good,​java.lang.Integer> Ship.cargo
    The cargo that the ship is currently carrying Initialization of the hash table requires non-primitive data types So int is replaced with its wrapper class Integer - Good thing to remember if using this in the future! Maps instances of Good to integers, representing how many of that good the ship contains.
    private static java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,​Good> GameStats.ECONOMY
    The collection of goods that the game runs with.
    private java.util.Hashtable<Good,​java.lang.Integer> GameStats.goodsSold
    Very similar to the ship's cargo HashTable, but this is used to keep track of what goods have been sold.
    private java.util.ArrayList<Good> Island.itemsBought
    items the island wants to buy
